name: Steve Goes to the Park
description:
Local funnyguy Steve Stickface and his beloved pooch travel the world together in an epic journey to reach the park and find some relaxation. This playable thing contains the theoretical first level, in which Steve is given the seemingly impossible task of exiting his own house.

This game is really buggy and unfinished, please note, but I'm posting it anyways for the fun of it.

I also made a Discord server, to see any progress updates on the game and interact with other players! Check it out here: https://discord.gg/2QQKS2fvzn
